snippet: The economic pie is growing, but the share going to American workers is at an all-time low. Friday's jobs report will help determine whether American workers will finally start getting a bigger cut.
abstract: The economic pie is growing, but the share going to American workers is at an all-time low. Friday's jobs report will help determine whether American workers will finally start getting a bigger cut.
lead_paragraph: 7:57 p.m. | Updated The economic pie is growing, but the share going to American workers is at a record low. Friday's jobs report is expected to show that Americans are not on their way to getting a bigger cut.

headline.main: What's at Stake in Friday's Jobs Report
